lines.text: I live to forget. Isn't that a beautiful life.
It is a strange life. Only adventurers want to cast away their memory.

[comes out of the kitchen]
The Prodigal son has returned.
The jukebox is fucking with me again!
You have returned. I waited for you for sixty days.
You are beautiful. Lower your sail here!
Your skirt on the chair, woman!
Drunk, yes. But just a little bit. When I'm drunk, I don't make mistakes. Let's get out of here!
Somewhere to get married for example!
We have only met three times. I'm in love with a man who I don't even see.
